titles.title: Expressing support for designation of February 3, 2018, as "United States Missing Persons Day".
Expressing support for designation of February 3, 2018, as "United States Missing Persons Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of United States Missing Persons Day to bring awareness to the issue of missing persons.
